properties.entry: SELECT /**/ COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A WHERE A.DELEVERY_NO = 'Y'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.ADMIN_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_DISPLAY , A.NOTICE_GENERAL , A.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.ADMIN_NAME , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.NOTICE_DISPLAY , B.NOTICE_GENERAL , B.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE FROM (SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.ADMIN_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_DISPLAY , A.NOTICE_GENERAL , A.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE FROM MG_NOTICE A JOIN MG_ADMIN B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.ADMIN_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_DISPLAY = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MG_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_TITLE = ? , A.NOTICE_BODY = ? WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ? AND A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = ?

INSERT INTO MG_NOTI_ATTACHMENT A ( A.ATTACHMENT_NO , A.REF_NOTI_NO , A.ORIGINAL_NAME , A.SAVED_NAME , A.SAVE_PATH , A.FILE_TYPE , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTI_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A WHERE A.DELIVERY_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A WHERE A.TRANSIT_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.DELIVERY_NO , B.DELIVERY_TYPE , B.TRANSIT_NO , B.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.DELIVERY_TYPE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.DELIVERY_NO , B.DELIVERY_TYPE , B.TRANSIT_NO , B.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.DELIVERY_NO , A.DELIVERY_TYPE , A.TRANSIT_NO , A.TRANSIT_DATE , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER_DELIVERY A JOIN MG_ORDER B ON (A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) WHERE A.TRANSIT_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
